snippet: The outlook for the current quarter was shy of expectations, and the company said weakness overseas would “continue to be a challenge.”
abstract: EBay reports second-quarter profit of $640 million, or 49 cents a share, down 8 percent from $692 million, or 53 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 14 percent to $3.88 billion.
lead_paragraph: The outlook for the current quarter was shy of expectations, and the company said weakness overseas would “continue to be a challenge.”

headline.main: Higher Expenses at eBay Push Net Income Down
headline.print_headline: Higher Expenses at eBay Push Net Income Down
